database-object.create: CREATE TABLE SentinelCPUStats ( Machine_ID INTEGER NOT NULL, Date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, Cpu INT NOT NULL, User DECIMAL(3,3) NOT NULL, System DECIMAL(3,3) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (Machine_ID, Date, Cpu) )
CREATE TABLE `SentinelMemoryStats` ( `Machine_ID` INTEGER NOT NULL, `Date` TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, `Used` BIGINT NOT NULL, `Total` BIGINT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`Machine_ID`, `Date`) )

CREATE TABLE `SentinelDiskUsageStats` ( `Machine_ID` INTEGER NOT NULL, `Date` TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, `Disk` VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL, `Used` BIGINT NOT NULL, `Total` BIGINT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`Machine_ID`, `Date`, `Disk`) )

CREATE TABLE `SentinelDiskIOStats` ( `Machine_ID` INTEGER NOT NULL, `Date` TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, `Disk` VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL, `Read` FLOAT NOT NULL, `Write` FLOAT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`Machine_ID`, `Date`, `Disk`) )

CREATE TABLE `SentinelNetworkStats` ( `Machine_ID` INTEGER NOT NULL, `Date` TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, `Device` VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL, `Send` BIGINT NOT NULL, `Receive` BIGINT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`Machine_ID`, `Date`, `Device`) )

CREATE TABLE `SentinelNetworkIOStats` ( `Machine_ID` INTEGER NOT NULL, `Date` TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, `Device` VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL, `Send` BIGINT NOT NULL, `Receive` BIGINT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`Machine_ID`, `Date`, `Device`) )
